meanings.definition: The state of being united or joined as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The school choir sang with unity during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The team showed great unity in working together to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked in unity to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the rainbow came together in perfect unity.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was incomplete until all the pieces were placed in unity.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being made one.
meanings.sent1: The family's unity was evident during the holiday celebrations.
meanings.sent2: The unity of the ingredients created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The unity of flavors in the soup surprised the chef.
meanings.sent4: The unity of voices in the choir concert was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The unity of purpose among the team members led to success.

meanings.definition: A whole or totality as combining all its parts into one.
meanings.sent1: The painting displayed a perfect unity of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The unity of the ecosystem was crucial for its balance.
meanings.sent3: The unity of the jigsaw puzzle pieces created a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the orchestra's instruments filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The unity of the ingredients in the recipe made a delicious cake.
